entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening. Rain beginning near midnight then changing to snow overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
